message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am interested in purchasing it. However, I can only pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. I would like to counter your offer by proposing $105 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations for profit while staying within my budget.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm glad we're close to a deal. I can offer it to you for $108, which is my best price for now.
